title: Nocturne Fear/Zed Ult interaction
body:
Not sure if it's intentional or not, but Nocturne fear procs during the untargetable phase of Zed's ult, no tethers mind you, just the fear itself. 
Now I know that tether abilities can proc through certain abilities like Vlad pool or Fizz E, but I mean Zed kinda ceases to be there, period. 
Working as intended or?

replies.body:
It doesn't say he physically goes anywhere else (and distance is needed to break tethers), so most likely it functions exactly like Elise's Rappel does, not moving from the spot but becoming untargetable and not visible.

A little counter-intuitive, but if you compare it to Elise it makes sense.

>Zed becomes untargetable for 0.75 seconds and blinks behind the target enemy champion. 

This is what is said for the ult on the wiki, so essentially what happens is as you ult, you stop being targetable, but you actually blink right behind them, meaning you create less distance between you and nocturne.
